name: Zoog.A.I. Ltd.
description: Developer of a visual communication platform designed to interact in a fresh and fun way. The company's platform offers an asynchronous communication experience to bring books to life using built-in AR masks, filters, sound effects, and animations, enabling people to create meaningful family moments.
one_liner: Developer of a visual communication platform designed to interact in a fresh and fun way. The company's platform offers an asynchronous communication experience to bring books to life using built-in AR masks, filters, sound effects, and animations, enabling people to create meaningful family moments.
industry: Education, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Consumer
